reviews.review: 2 kewl super wow 15/10 purple man so alpha get rekt avengerz better call Howard the duck 4 help
Undoubtedly a movie that was not only able to give the audience a thrilling ride in terms of action but also manages to strike the perfect balance between humor and the emotional aspect of a movie
Honestly I walked out, this movie was complete trash.  Nearly unwatchable.

The first question anyone with common sense might ask is "How could a movie with dozens of main characters all of whom have been spotlighted in their own films, not deteriote into a hodgepodge of camp, isolated  vignettes?" The answer is simple: bind them together in a singular, desperate purpose against a for that makes even gods  nothing more than insects.  The  performance of Josh Brolin is what made this movie possible.  Sure, out favorite characters do not disappoint, and the teaming of Rockit /Thor,  and Starlord/Srange/Spiderman is worth the price of admission alone.  But it is Thanos who is the glue that binds them all in their heroism, sacrifice, pain and despair .  Although the unparalled cgi and action scenes serve as a reminder how poorly formed Justice League really was, I found myself hanging on the "slow"  scenes where Brolin brought Thanos to life.  At times I found myself sympathizing, even rooting for him.  I went back to the "ant-boot comment in the first film: ants will fight to live but sometimes they just need to die, and so it was with my heroes.  My only complaint is the ending because I fear some sort of "magical  resurrection" or time reset vis  a vis  the comic world that will render it meaningless.  We can only wait for the arrival of Capt Marvel in  to find out.  See this movie again and again, revel in it because it's a moment in movie history that we may never see again.

Felt like I was in a 3 hour DC movie-- under delivered. Most disappointment from a 
Marvel movie.
Just wow... That's my spoiler free review!
Amazing Characters, Amazing Plot, Amazing Filming, Amazing Movie

I just got to see Avengers Infinity War. I still do not assimilate what happened. What created Infinity War today, I had not generated any other movie in my life. Call me exaggerated but I do not know how I feel.

They were right, nobody is prepared for IW.
Neither knowing everything about Marvel, nor reading the comic books on which the film was based, nor watching all the MCU films you will be prepared.

The best movie I've ever seen. A bomb of emotions. It's the best you'll see in your life, a movie full of surprises, things you do not expect, and the best villain in the history of cinema.

I can just say ... THANK YOU MARVEL!
